patch 8.2.0755: Vim9: No error when variable initializer is not a constant

Problem:    Vim9: No error when variable initializer is not a constant.
Solution:   Return FAIL when trying to get a variable value.  Do not execute a
            script when an error is deteted in the first or second phase.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0755: Vim9: No error when variable initializer is not a con… · vim/vim@227a69d
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0755: Vim9: No error when variable initializer is not a con… · vim/vim@227a69d
attachments.text: …stant Problem: Vim9: No error when variable initializer is not a constant. Solution: Return FAIL when trying to get a variable value. Do not execute a script when an error is de...

patch 8.2.0759: Vim9: missing changes for performance improvements

Problem:    Vim9: missing changes for performance improvements
Solution:   Use GA_GROW().  Don't call breakcheck so often.

attachments.title: patch 8.2.0759: Vim9: missing changes for performance improvements · vim/vim@270d038
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: missing changes for performance improvements Solution: Use GA_GROW(). Don't call breakcheck so often.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/fd615a3c901f59abddca27c6a09940be552c0f4d|patch 8.2.0765: In the GUI can't use all the modifiers.>
patch 8.2.0765: In the GUI can't use all the modifiers.

Problem:    In the GUI can't use all the modifiers. (Andri Möll)
Solution:   Do not apply Alt/Meta early, do it later like with the terminal.
            Avoid the Motif test from crashing.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0765: In the GUI can't use all the modifiers. · vim/vim@fd615a3
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0765: In the GUI can't use all the modifiers. · vim/vim@fd615a3
attachments.text: Problem: In the GUI can't use all the modifiers. (Andri Möll) Solution: Do not apply Alt/Meta early, do it later like with the terminal. Avoid the Motif test from crashing.

patch 8.2.0766: display error when using 'number' and 'breakindent'

            closes #5986)
